posts.post_content: not the best combo, yet since lifelink and trample are quite useful on this card, you might want to combine it either with [Loxodon Warhammer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Loxodon Warhammer) or [Armadillo Cloak](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Armadillo Cloak) to both double your life total and this guy's p/t. :D

posts.post_content: I've been in 5 digit life because of this card. It takes time, but it's very possible (back in the day, I pulled this off many, many times). Make sure you have Angelic Chorus & Angelic Renewel in play. Elvish Piper out your Avatar & double your life (for sake of simplicity, say you're at 10) and you go to 20. Clone your Avatar and you're at 40. Worthy Cause (with buyback) the Clone & you're now at 80, and then bury Angelic Renewal to bring back Clone and you're at 160. Again, I can't tell you how many times I pulled that off. Trust me, it sounds way more difficult and circumstantial than it really is. So anyone who tried to say that this card is over-rated or tried to shoot it down with a single card, eat that.
posts.html:
I've been in 5 digit life because of this card. It takes time, but it's very possible (back in the day, I pulled this off many, many times). Make sure you have Angelic Chorus & Angelic Renewel in play. Elvish Piper out your Avatar & double your life (for sake of simplicity, say you're at 10) and you go to 20. Clone your Avatar and you're at 40. Worthy Cause (with buyback) the Clone & you're now at 80, and then bury Angelic Renewal to bring back Clone and you're at 160. Again, I can't tell you how many times I pulled that off. Trust me, it sounds way more difficult and circumstantial than it really is. So anyone who tried to say that this card is over-rated or tried to shoot it down with a single card, eat that.

posts.post_content:
@Vadoff and whitepheonix87   
  
Serra does in fact hit the graveyard, it isnt an "if" clause, so it isnt replaced by going to the deck, it goes to the grave, remembrance goes on the stack, the angels ability to be shuffled back in goes on the stack, angel resolves and sits neatly in the library, and remembrance fishes it out.
posts.html:
@Vadoff and whitepheonix87

Serra does in fact hit the graveyard, it isnt an "if" clause, so it isnt replaced by going to the deck, it goes to the grave, remembrance goes on the stack, the angels ability to be shuffled back in goes on the stack, angel resolves and sits neatly in the library, and remembrance fishes it out.

posts.post_content:
1. Put a [Celestial Mantle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Celestial Mantle) on this...
  
2. Equip it with [Loxodon Warhammer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Loxodon Warhammer)...
  
3. Attack!
  
4. ???
  
5. PROFIT!!!
  
   
Say you have ten life. Then Serra Avatar becomes a 16/13 trample lifelink monstrosity. Upon attacking and dealing damage, the lifelink gives you 16 life before Celestial Mantle's trigger resolves (Celestial Mantle rulings). Serra Avatar becomes 32/29, then your life total becomes 52, and Serra Avatar is 58/55. After a single attack...
  
   
Then, for each attack, your life total goes up to...
  
   
220, 892, 3580, 14332, 57340, 229372, 917500, 3670012, 14680060, 58720252, 234881020, 939524092, 3758096380
  
   
..................................
